game.name: Tour - Chess Puzzles
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Elegant, varied and challenging chess-themed puzzles. No prior knowledge of chess is needed.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Elegant, varied and challenging chess-themed puzzles. No prior knowledge of chess is needed.
